Customer.label: phoneNumber
Customer.description: The phone number of the customer or prospect.

Customer.label: smsNumber
Customer.description: The mobile SMS number of the customer.

Customer.label: email
Customer.description: Email Identifier of the Customer.

Customer.label: street
Customer.description: Contains the street name of the customer or the property.

Customer.label: addressCity
Customer.description: The town and/or city component of the base address of a customer.

Customer.label: country
Customer.description: Identifies the country of the customer or a property or organization.

Customer.label: legalId
Customer.description: Unique reference number of the legal documents submitted as identification proof.

Customer.label: legalDocumentName
Customer.description: Name of the legal documents such as passport, driving licence etc., provided as identification proof.

Customer.label: legalIssueAuthorised
Customer.description: Authority who issued the legal document.

Customer.label: legalIssueCountry
Customer.description: Indicates the country where the authorized legal document is issued.

Customer.label: legalIssueDate
Customer.description: Date of Issue of the legal document.

Customer.label: legalExpiredDate
Customer.description: Expiry date of the legal document submitted as proof.

Customer.label: language
Customer.description: The language that the contents of the field are displayed in.

Customer.label: dateOfBirth
Customer.description: The date of birth of an individual customer.

Customer.label: customerStatus
Customer.description: The internal bank status of a customer.

Customer.label: accountOfficerId
Customer.description: The identifier of the department head or specific account officer responsible for the customer.

Customer.label: gender
Customer.description: Gender of the Individual Customer.

Customer.label: state
Customer.description: Represents a subdivision of a country such as province, state, region, country.

Customer.label: postCode
Customer.description: Identifies the address postal code for the customer or the property.

Customer.label: contactDate
Customer.description: Date that first contact was made with the Customer.

Customer.label: lastName
Customer.description: The last name of an individual customer.

Customer.label: givenName
Customer.description: Customer's given name.

Customer.label: customerType
Customer.description: Identifies the type of customers. Example Personal, Business, Corporate, etc.

Customer.label: customerId
Customer.description: Identifier of the customer.

CurSav Accounts.label: accountId
CurSav Accounts.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number.

CurSav Accounts.label: displayName
CurSav Accounts.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes.

CurSav Accounts.label: customerRole
CurSav Accounts.description: Indicates role of a customer for an arrangement.

CurSav Accounts.label: productId
CurSav Accounts.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product.

CurSav Accounts.label: status
CurSav Accounts.description: Specifies the status of the agreement.

CurSav Accounts.label: availableBalance
CurSav Accounts.description: Available balance of the account which is the projected balance.

CurSav Accounts.description: Real-time balance including all authorised transactions.

CurSav Accounts.label: lockedAmount
CurSav Accounts.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account.

CurSav Accounts.label: availableLimit
CurSav Accounts.description: The portion of an allocated credit limit that is available.

CurSav Accounts.label: productDescription
CurSav Accounts.description: Indicates the description of the Product.

CurSav Accounts.description: Indicates the account or contract product name.

Fixed Term Accounts.description: Name of Joint Customer.

Fixed Term Accounts.description: Indicates the account or contract product name.

Fixed Term Accounts.description: Identifies the bid rate of the related currency for the defined time period.

Fixed Term Accounts.label: interestStatement

Fixed Term Accounts.description: Specifies the status of the agreement.

Loan Accounts.description: Indicates the interest rate type (Fixed.

Loan Accounts.description: Specifies the number of coupon or interest payments in a year.

Loan Accounts.description: The principal balance due when pay off the account in a future date.

Loan Accounts.description: The accrued Interest due or accrued.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction in the core system.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: The activity (e.g. CREDIT DEBIT FEE_APPLIED).

CurSav Account Transactions.label: transactionAmount
CurSav Account Transactions.description: Contains the transaction amount.

CurSav Account Transactions.label: currency
CurSav Account Transactions.description: Type of currency.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value.

CurSav Account Transactions.label: transactionDate
CurSav Account Transactions.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction date.

CurSav Account Transactions.label: bookingDate
CurSav Account Transactions.description: Indicates the date on which this business activity is booked in the underlying system.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Determines the status of events sent to external system.

CurSav Account Transactions.label: userRole
CurSav Account Transactions.description: User who initiated the transaction.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Contains the branch name/code.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Indicates the property description to which benefit has been applied.

CurSav Account Transactions.label: chargesChargeAmount
CurSav Account Transactions.description: The charges or fees for this transaction.

CurSav Account Transactions.label: taxRate
CurSav Account Transactions.description: Indicates tax charged to an account.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Available balance of the account.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Shows reserved amount for the underlying account for a given balance reservation event.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Contains the approved overdraft limit.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Indicates interest accumulated for an account for the defined time period.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Indicates the actual interest rate applied for the account after adjustment/tier calculation.

CurSav Account Transactions.description: Contains the overdraft limit still available to be utilized.

CurSav Account Transactions.label: channel
CurSav Account Transactions.description: Contains the channel in which the activity was performed.
